mantras: THIS DAY WILL NOT COME AGAIN
footer_quotes: TIME IS THE ONLY NON-RENEWABLE RESOURCE
WE ARE ALWAYS GETTING READY TO LIVE BUT NEVER LIVING.
IT IS NOT THAT WE HAVE A SHORT TIME TO LIVE, BUT THAT WE WASTE A LOT OF IT.
YOU COULD LEAVE LIFE RIGHT NOW. LET THAT DETERMINE WHAT YOU DO.
THE TWO MOST POWERFUL WARRIORS ARE PATIENCE AND TIME.
LOST TIME IS NEVER FOUND AGAIN.
WHAT WE DO NOW ECHOES IN ETERNITY.
DO NOT ACT AS IF YOU HAD TEN THOUSAND YEARS TO THROW AWAY.
REGRET IS THE ONLY GHOST THAT HAUNTS THE LIVING.
THE BEST TIME TO PLANT A TREE WAS 20 YEARS AGO. THE SECOND BEST TIME IS NOW.
HOW LONG ARE YOU GOING TO WAIT BEFORE YOU DEMAND THE BEST FOR YOURSELF?
YOUR TIME IS LIMITED, SO DON'T WASTE IT LIVING SOMEONE ELSE'S LIFE.
EVERY ACTION YOU TAKE IS A VOTE FOR THE TYPE OF PERSON YOU WISH TO BECOME.
WE HAVE TWO LIVES, AND THE SECOND BEGINS WHEN WE REALIZE WE ONLY HAVE ONE.
A MAN WHO DARES TO WASTE ONE HOUR OF TIME HAS NOT DISCOVERED THE VALUE OF LIFE.
THE FUTURE DEPENDS ON WHAT YOU DO TODAY.
YOU CANNOT ESCAPE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF TOMORROW BY EVADING IT TODAY.
HE WHO HAS A WHY TO LIVE CAN BEAR ALMOST ANY HOW.
WASTE NO MORE TIME ARGUING WHAT A GOOD MAN SHOULD BE. BE ONE.
IMPATIENCE WITH ACTIONS, PATIENCE WITH RESULTS.
